content:
Careers

Opportunity awaits in the picturesque Pocono Mountains.

  • Unlimited Career Growth
  • Multiple-Brand Experience
  • Long-Term Career Possibilities
  • Your Change To Make An Impact
  • Inspiring Leadership

We recognize all the passion and dedication that has built this remarkable Team here at Split Rock Resort. We hope you do too! Here are some of the things happening for our Team Mates...

  • For your wellbeing – medical, dental, vision, employee assistance program...
  • For your security – short term disability, long term disability, life insurance...
  • For your personal situation – personal time off, vacation time off, holiday pay, bereavement leave, jury duty, 401(k)...

Here's where to find us...
Split Rock Resort – Lake Harmony, PA

Click here to apply to join us in the Pocono Mountains.
